EmailTemplate.name: 2019.11.18 - Prelogin - How to buy a laptop.Prelogin - How to buy a laptop
EmailTemplate.subject: Find Your Fit: Laptop Edition
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Find The Right Laptop Choosing a laptop for your employees is an important decision. It can be tricky to find the right laptop as there is no ‘one size fits all’. With so many options on the market, it can be hard to know where to start. Read our blog, it can help!
